org.lwjgl.glfw

Class GLFWGammaRamp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWGammaRamp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class GLFWGammaRamp
extends Struct
    Describes the gamma ramp for a monitor.

    GLFWgammaramp members

    MemberTypeDescription
    redunsigned shortan array of value describing the response of the red channel
    greenunsigned shortan array of value describing the response of the green channel
    blueunsigned shortan array of value describing the response of the blue channel
    sizeunsigned intthe number of elements in each array

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLFWGammaRamp

        public GLFWGammaRamp(long struct)
        Creates a GLFWGammaRamp instance at the specified memory address.

      • GLFWGammaRamp

        public GLFWGammaRamp(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a GLFWGammaRamp instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
